name: Dropdown
description: A menu of actions or options triggered by a button. Supports icons, labels, dividers, submenus, checkable items, and destructive actions.

do: Use for contextual actions on a single item
Group related actions with labels and dividers
Use destructive styling for irreversible actions
Provide clear, concise labels for each action
dont: Don't use for navigation â€” use a nav menu instead
Don't nest more than two levels of submenus
Don't put too many items in a single dropdown (aim for < 12)

variants.name: With Submenus
variants.description: Nested menu items for deeper hierarchy

props.name: items
props.description: Array of menu items to display

props.name: offset
props.description: Skidding offset along the trigger edge

props.name: onSelect
props.description: Callback when an item is selected

accessibility.guideline: Use role="menu" and role="menuitem" for proper semantics
Support keyboard navigation with arrow keys
Escape key should close the dropdown
Focus should return to the trigger when closed
